name: 10 Seconds Without Gravity
description:
An accident on board the ISS has left you floating  in space surrounded by flying debris with only TEN seconds of oxygen remaining!

Vent oxygen from your suit to propel yourself (left mouse) and locate the escape shuttle before you run out. But be careful, the more you use for propulsion the less you have to breathe!

Collect the red oxygen canisters to survive longer, and avoid the flying debris.

GOOD LUCK ASTRONAUT!

CONTROLS:

LEFT MOUSE - Vent Oxygen.
ESC - Restart
M - Mute sounds
